HOME_PAGE.HEADING: Welcome to fix and maintain your treasures!
SUBTITLES: On this site you will find a repair service for your broken or worn out product, whether it is ripp-off jeans or a broken coffee table. The site also offers DIY instructions to help you fix and maintain your belongings yourself.
